plot: Tthe film is based on the concept of &"New America&" in the year 2097, two decades after a nuclear apocalypse. Tex Kennedy, two robotic ex-secret service agents, and a mythical female cannibal journey to find a famously dangerous area known as the &"Threshold of Hell&" to gain access to a radio tower to unite the survivors of the apocalypse.
title: The Beach Party at the Threshold of Hell
